Every child deserves the opportunity to get education. Unfortunately, basic education is out of reach for millions of children around the world. Sometimes, the lack of necessities, such as a balanced nutritious meal, can prevent children from receiving a basic education and reaching their full potential. Through our partnership with @[The Akshaya Patra Foundation](urn:li:organization:349797) in India, we are trying to change that. 🤝   Over the past nine years, we have helped serve 70 million mid-day meals to school children in India. The meals improve the students’ academic performance and concentration in the classroom and incentivise attendance. They also come as a relief for many families who can send their children to school knowing that they will be properly fed. Sometimes this is the only substantial meal that the child eats in a day.  On June 2, we commemorated this milestone at a special event at the GHPS Ejipura School in Bengaluru. 🙏    Click the link and learn more about the initiative!   #EducationForAll #India #Charity #DeutscheBank #dbPlusYou #PositiveImpact

🎸 Are you ready for our Monday Meeting Challenge? Let’s rock your calendar with some meeting tips.   The Future of Work is not just about where we work, but how we work. That is the reason why we want to evolve and share our meeting culture. Our first Monday Meeting Challenge is dedicated to multitasking. By multitasking, we cannibalise our productive time! This Monday’s challenge is to focus 100% on the meetings you join – no chats on Teams or short in-between dialogues with a colleague in parallel. By focusing we enable active engagement by everyone, absorbing information and encouraging solutions.  If you catch yourself multitasking in a meeting, ask yourself why. Is it because your participation is not essential for the meeting? Then ask to be excused from the meeting. Is it because you don’t understand what is required? Then ask the host to clarify. Is it because you’re not prepared enough to follow the conversation? In that case, make sure to take time to prepare ahead of the next meeting. Or is it because you have too many other things to do? Then you might have to re-think your current priorities.  Any other tips? Feel free to comment! ✍️   #MeetingCulture #Culture #MondayMeetingChallenge #DeutscheBank

🐝 Today’s #WorldEnvironmentDay calls for global solutions to combat plastic pollution. Within Deutsche Bank’s "How We Live" programme for environmental impact, our employees volunteer to clean up litter from beaches, rivers, forests, and streets and learn more about the impact of plastic pollution and the role we can all play in preserving nature.   In 24 countries, the bank supports over 50 "How We Live projects" focused on oceans and coastlines, rivers and wetlands, forests, farmland, and urban green spaces. Last year, more than 2,800 employees were engaged in these initiatives. And our environmental awareness projects and training reached over 26,000 people as we want to motivate the next generation to not only care for the natural world, but to lead the way in building a more environmentally-friendly society. 🌻  Learn more about "How We Live" here: https://lnkd.in/e236PFdF  #dbHowWeLive #PositiveImpact #dbPlusYou #BeatPlasticPollution

Over the past several years, we have been helping bring joy and respite to palliative care patients, and their families in Singapore, through our partnership with HCA Hospice Limited \(HCA\). This week, we were honored to accept the Agency for Integrated Care’s \(AIC\) ‘Friends of Community Care Award’ for supporting hospice patients. The award recognises corporates who have contributed tirelessly to Singapore’s community care sector.  HCA is one of Deutsche Bank Singapore’s “Donate One Day” charities, a CSR programme which gives employees the chance to donate the equivalent of one working day, or more, of their salary to charity each year. In addition to raising funds for the hospice, our colleagues regularly volunteer at the charity, providing companionship and support to hospice patients and their families. Our Middle East Foundation is proud to partner with @[Wataneya Society](urn:li:organization:3211076) to support their child protection and identity training program for children in 20 institutional homes and orphanages across Egypt.  The program includes training caregivers, social workers and management, as well as raising awareness among children about their basic needs and rights, and empowering them to report incidents to protect themselves. Referentes de inversión, un proyecto de Deutsche Bank en el que varios expertos analizan qué está pasando y por qué en el mundo de las finanzas. @[RAQUEL CARRILLO](urn:li:person:Uv3yJZV7Lh), directora de Marketing-IPB, señala que “lanzamos este proyecto con el objetivo de acercar la inversión de forma didáctica y atractiva a todos los interesados en el tema. Sabemos que nos encontramos ante un problema de infoxicación en internet, hay tanta información acerca de cualquier tema que es difícil discernir la información relevante y de valor, de la que no lo es. Por ello, este proyecto selecciona a Referentes de inversión, con una trayectoria contrastada que nos ayudan a entender temas clave del mundo de la inversión”. https://lnkd.in/dMy8gZHN

🐠 Oceans provide us with food, regulate our climate and support the livelihoods of millions. From empowering local islanders to protect endangered turtles, to restoring coastal reefs, we are helping to conserve and restore marine biodiversity across the Asia Pacific region through our partnership with @[The Nature Conservancy](urn:li:organization:157338) \(TNC\).  As part of our CSR "How We Live" environmental impact programme, we are supporting community conservation projects in Indonesia, Hong Kong SAR, Mainland China and Australia, contributing to efforts to safeguard wildlife species and replenish shellfish reefs, one of the world’s most critically endangered marine ecosystems.  By supporting these marine conservation projects around the region, we are helping restore the health of our oceans, benefitting marine life, local communities, and coastal economies for generations to come.  You can read more about this programme here: https://lnkd.in/ebxPNaz2  #WorldOceansDay #HowWeLive #Biodiversity #DeutscheBank

Congratulations to all of the nominees and winners at the InsideOut Mental Health awards earlier this week – recognising the work being done across the bank and the commitment of key individuals in driving progress on this critical topic.   Helen Gibbons was a well-deserving winner in the Future Leader category for her dedication to the Mental Health First Aid programme – initially in the UK and now supporting colleagues expand the programme to other locations. 👏👏  The bank was also delighted to be awarded ‘Best Use of Technology’ in recognition of the Global Hackathon which involved teams from across the globe developing prototype apps which drive real-world change in digital therapy for mental health. 🏆🏆  The bank received eight nominations in total. Richard Moffat and Scott Robinson were recognised as ‘Behind the Scenes Champions’ for their efforts in advocating work/life balance and supporting key initiatives such as the MHFA programme and the comprehensive offer to employees in yoga and mindfulness. Fabrizio Campelli, Head of the Corporate and Investment Bank and Member of the Management Board was commended for his executive sponsorship of mental health and well-being. More generally, the bank was nominated for its ongoing commitment to removing the stigma and education around mental health including the current partnership with @[MQ Mental Health Research](urn:li:organization:5204142) our Charity of the Year in the UK and Ireland.   Ben Idle, Executive Sponsor of the MHFA programme said “It is amazing to see so many colleagues, including Fabrizio Campelli – the bank’s co-sponsor of Well-being, recognised by our peers in financial services and other industries, for their invaluable contributions to advocating the topic of mental health.”   Read more on Well-being at Deutsche Bank: https://lnkd.in/e7KPfuGs    #MoreThanBanking #InclusiveCulture #PositiveImpact

¿Sabías que, si los océanos fueran un país, serían la séptima economía más grande del mundo? Con motivo del #DíaDeLosOcéanos celebrado ayer, @[Markus H.-P. Müller](urn:li:person:RFJIrO2j05), director de Inversiones #ESG de @[Deutsche Bank International Private Bank](urn:li:organization:54331860), explica en @[La Razón](urn:li:organization:133459) que los océanos representan un gran motor económico. Se estima que el valor de los principales activos oceánicos en alrededor de 24 billones de dólares estadounidenses, con un valor anual de bienes y servicios de aproximadamente 2,5 billones de dólares, lo que equivaldría aproximadamente al 5% del PIB mundial.  En esta entrevista podrás descubrir la dimensión económica de los océanos. https://lnkd.in/d7aSyGhC

Empathy is at the core of a truly inclusive organization. By understanding the experiences of LGBTQ people and challenging discrimination, we create an environment where everyone feels safe to express their true selves, both personally and professionally.  "People can choose not to share themselves at work for a multitude of reasons. We don't have the right to demand authenticity from one another, but we can have empathy," says Nic, who works with our Technology, Data and Innovation team in Australia.  For years, Nic kept his true self hidden from his colleagues and pretended to be straight. After joining Deutsche Bank, he was finally able to open up after seeking the support and assistance of the bank's Employee Assistance Program.  #PrideMonth provides us with the opportunity to celebrate the progress we have made collectively, while recognizing that there is still work to be done.  #LGBTQInclusion #dbPride #DiversityandInclusion

Last night we were delighted to be recognised as a leader in our approach towards the positive mental wellbeing of our employees at the This Can Happen Global Awards. 🏆    Established in January 2022, our Neurodiversity Network was awarded Best Employee Resource Group. Chaired by Hannah Longman, a Programme Manager in our Chief Technology Office, the group has quickly grown to more than 600 members – providing peer support to neurodivergent colleagues and information and resources to employees across the bank. The judges commented on the network setting an ‘exceptional standard for all big businesses’ and were impressed with the importance given to the topic within the bank since early in 2021.   There was further cause for celebration when the judges named Deutsche Bank the Grand Prix Winner 2023 – describing the bank as ‘helping to redefine perceptions of neurodiversity, harnessing the particular talents of neurodiverse colleagues and providing a supportive environment’.   Huge congratulations to @[Hannah Longman](urn:li:person:OxH3rbERen), @[Adam Livesey](urn:li:person:MNUV1qBuQb), Nicky Chambers, Debra Main, @[Nils Wickelgren](urn:li:person:C0N4_E_xnI), @[John Emanuel](urn:li:person:BXdUKL0sE7),and @[Sissel Heiberg](urn:li:person:q_CJLOa3E-) for making the bank and more inclusive workplace where all employees can feel at home.   #MoreThanBanking #InclusiveCulture #PositiveImpact

Congratulations to our Treasury Issuance team! 🎉   The team was named “Most Impressive Issuer” in the Covered Bond Report’s Awards for Excellence for its outstanding performance in covered bond issuance over the past year. 🏆   @[Jonathan Blake](urn:li:person:M-ce3ZgAK1), Head of Issuance and Securitisation, said: “We put a lot of work into sizing and timing our issuance activity to match market demand, so it was great to see this external recognition from the Covered Bond Report.”   Let’s highlight some of our current success stories on the Pfandbrief market over the past 12 months: ➡ In June 2022, we issued a € 1 billion, 15-year Pfandbrief - a tenor which no other issuer ventured to attempt.  ➡ Followed by six more tranches, taking our total Pfandbrief volume to € 5.5 billion across tenors ranging from 3.5 years to 15 years. ➡ In May this year, we issued a 10-year Pfandbrief not seen in the market since January.    This award comes after a successful start to 2023 for our Treasury Issuance team. So far this year, the team has helped Deutsche Bank issue some € 9 billion across all forms of debt including seven benchmark issues – strong progress towards our full year 2023 issuance plan.   #deutschebank #PositiveImpact #Pfandbrief #coveredbond #treasury

📢 Update on our Management Board: Following thorough handover work and very good progress preparing for the future leadership structure the handover of responsibilities of @[Karl von Rohr](urn:li:person:QGUHj3OMMi) on our Management Board can already happen on July 1. As such, @[Claudio de Sanctis](urn:li:person:HvYq5k0l_r) takes over responsibility for the Private Bank and becomes a member of the Management Board. CFO @[James von Moltke](urn:li:person:AyZRWR39dI) will take on additional responsibility for Asset Management, while @[Alexander von zur Muehlen](urn:li:person:uWE_m-NtY4) will assume responsibility for Europe, the Middle East and Africa \(EMEA, excluding UK and Ireland\) and Germany in addition to his existing mandate in the Asia-Pacific region.    Karl will remain a member of the Management Board until his contract expires on October 31. He will advise his successors and continue to support an orderly transition. A big thank you to Karl for his efforts in ensuring a smooth transition. We are looking forward to shaping the future of our #GlobalHausbank with our new Management Board.    #Management #BoardMembers #DeutscheBank

We recently celebrated Active Allyship and Intersectionality at our annual dbINclusive awards in the UK and Ireland 🏆. This event gathered six Employee Resource Groups in the region with guest speaker @[Nicolas Hamilton](urn:li:person:lLyt0FOuxd).   Nicolas gave a candid insight into living with Cerebral Palsy. He explained how he battled the odds to become the first disabled driver in the British Touring Car Championship. His story, filled with lessons learned and the support he's received, pushes him to inspire as many people as he can.   UKI Chief Executive Officer, @[Tiina Lee](urn:li:person:QSJnMFt-as) spoke of the need to continually build relationships that support underrepresented or marginalised groups. This should consider various facets of an individual’s identity and how they intersect to shape their unique experiences - not just focusing on one aspect.   Our UKI COO, @[Nicola Atkinson](urn:li:person:OJ-z7y2Yt7), announced the winners of this year's internal UKI DEI awards:  ☑ Allyship Award: @[Michelle Yeoman](urn:li:person:2t__mJCJ9I) ☑ Role Model: @[Terence Perera, FCA](urn:li:person:yprNFou5vx) ☑ Rising Star Award: @[Andrews Izirein BA, CCIBS](urn:li:person:i88fbA3TSq)  ☑ Recruitment Diversity Champion: @[Jason Connery](urn:li:person:yfzS4fIh8F) ☑ Initiative of the Year: SayMyName a tool that allows our people to record how their name is pronounced.   Huge congratulations to all our winners for their achievements and dedication in creating an inclusive and supportive work environment. 👏    #MoreThanBanking #InclusiveCulture #PositiveImpact.

We are pleased to support @[Global Power Generation](urn:li:organization:1754339)'s \(GPG\) Berrybank Stage 2 Wind Farm in Victoria and a Battery Energy Storage System in the Australia Capital Territory, Australia. This project will significantly contribute to the state's clean energy goals and support Australia's transition to a low-carbon future.   With 26 Vestas wind turbines and a 20MWh of battery storage, the project is expected to accelerate the growth of Australia's renewable energy sector and advance sustainability objectives. Spanning approximately 5,000 hectares, the wind farm is expected to generate 390 GWh of clean energy annually, equivalent to the electricity consumption of 71,000 households.    “This is the fourth wind farm that Deutsche Bank has financed for GPG in Australia. We are delighted to play a role in financing the project and supporting global energy transition by reducing reliance on fossil fuels.” said @[Rachel Chia](urn:li:person:y-AbwcBEX0), our APAC Head of Project Finance for @[Deutsche Bank Corporate Bank](urn:li:organization:38166507).   “We look forward to continuing to support renewable projects and promoting sustainable financing in Australia by leveraging our global network and expertise.”   #SustainableFinance #Renewables #ESG

Inflation und \(k\)ein Ende?  🎧 Volkswirt Sebastian Becker guckt auf die harten Inflationsfakten und erklärt in der neuen Podzept-Folge, wohin die Inflation mittel- und langfristig steuert. Obwohl sie sich zuletzt auf 6,1% abgeschwächt hat und die Preise zum Glück nicht mehr so stark steigen wie im Winter, ist es noch zu früh, um Entwarnung zu geben.   Hier einige Fakten: ➡ Von den Kraftstoff- & Heizölpreisen geht mittlerweile ein dämpfender Effekt auf die Gesamtinflationsrate aus. ➡ Die Einführung des Deutschland-Tickets hat zur Abschwächung der Inflationsrate beigetragen. ➡ Bei Gas und Strom hat die Jahresteuerungsrate deutlich nachgelassen. Die Energiepreisinflation liegt gegenüber Vorjahr nur noch bei 2,6% \(Mai-Wert\). ➡ Bei Bereichen, die sich nicht auf Lebensmittel oder Energie beziehen, wie Möbel, Autos, Elektronikgüter, Reisen etc., ist die Jahresteuerungsrate immer noch stark erhöht.  ➡ Bei Nahrungsmitteln liegen die Preise im Schnitt noch immer um 14,9% höher als im Vorjahr.   Wohin geht die Reise bei der Inflation, wie steht Deutschland im Vergleich zu Europa da und welche Rolle spielt dabei der Euro? Das erfahren Sie im aktuellen Podcast von @[Deutsche Bank Research](urn:li:organization:77576048): https://lnkd.in/eDbTHD8j  #Inflation #Podcast #Podzept

For the fourth year running, Deutsche Bank is featured in the @[The Times](urn:li:organization:10208) Top 50 Employers for Gender Equality, evaluated by gender equality experts @[Business in the Community](urn:li:organization:162840).  Rebecca Short, Chief Operating Officer and Member of the Management Board, said: “Deutsche Bank is committed to creating a more gender balanced workforce. We are proud to once again be named in The Times Top 50 Employers for Gender Equality, which recognises the progress we are making to attract, retain and develop talented women. We will continue to monitor the progress of our initiatives and measure their impact to support a diverse, equitable and inclusive work environment."  Tiina Lee, Chief Executive Officer, UK & Ireland, said: “Our continuous efforts in diversity and inclusion, supported by our passionate team, have positioned us alongside some of the world's top companies. We're working tirelessly not only to enhance gender equality, but inclusivity in all forms. Thanks to initiatives like our Inclusive Talent Programmes and a global network of senior female leaders, we're actively paving the way for a more equitable workplace for everyone. Our journey continues, but today we’re delighted to celebrate this milestone.”  In 2021, we announced our refreshed global gender diversity goal of at least 35% of women in the Managing Director, Director and Vice President population combined by 2025 \(’35 by 25’\). The UK remains on track to achieve its target this year and we are also making an impact through hiring and promotion, with a record year for promotions of women in the region.  #EqualityAtWork has never been so important. We are committed to ensuring all of our employees can thrive.  Discover more on how we are advancing gender diversity towards '35 by 25' https://lnkd.in/dcMW8nb5  #MoreThanBanking #GenderEquality #TimesTop50 #PositiveImpact

🆙 Starting the week with good news: @[Fitch Ratings](urn:li:organization:163842) has just upgraded our principal ratings in ‘A’ territory. Our Issuer Default Rating has been raised to ‘A-‘ from ‘BBB+’, with a stable outlook, while the Viability Rating rises to ‘a-‘ from ‘bbb+’. Fitch raises both the bank’s Long-Term Deposit Rating and Senior Preferred Debt Rating from ‘A-‘ to ‘A’, while the Senior Non-Preferred Debt Rating rises to ‘A-‘, up from ‘BBB+’.    Just last week @[DBRS Morningstar](urn:li:organization:20644) raised several of our ratings. The Long-Term Issuer Rating and Long-Term Deposit Rating rose to ‘A‘, while the Long-Term Senior Debt Rating and Long-Term Senior Non-Preferred Debt Rating were upgraded to ‘A‘ and ‘A \(low\)‘. DBRS also raised the long-term critical obligations rating to ‘AA \(low\)‘. All ratings have a stable outlook.   Our CEO @[Christian Sewing](urn:li:person:8kw5JTdFVj) said: "It is very encouraging to see yet more recognition for our transformation efforts from an important stakeholder. With a profitable and well-balanced business model and a strong balance sheet, we have built a solid platform to deepen our partnerships with clients and deliver sustainable growth.”   In May @[S&P Global](urn:li:organization:2934) raised their outlook to positive and back in October @[Moody's Corporation](urn:li:organization:165033)’s upgrade our bank’s ratings.    Read the full media release: https://lnkd.in/eT3pJVsg    #ratings #banking #finance #deutschebank #globalhausbank #positiveimpact

@[Tim Baker](urn:li:person:J4rb0xDj-y) our Head of Macro Research, highlights the need for active quantitative tightening measures by the Reserve Bank of Australia \(RBA\) in a recent article by @[The Australian](urn:li:organization:1008560).    According to Baker, the RBA has been reliant on the cash rate as its primary policy tool, leading to far higher housing costs for mortgage-payers and renters. Active quantitative tightening could supplement that approach by lowering asset prices, which could spread the impact of policy tightening to the 30% of households who own their home outright.   If you have subscribed to The Australian, you can read the full article here:  https://lnkd.in/e9DDzyer   @[Deutsche Bank Research](urn:li:organization:77576048)  @[Tim Baker](urn:li:person:J4rb0xDj-y)  #Macroeconomics #QuantitativeTightening #AustralianEconomy

Esta mañana, @[Rosa Duce Tello](urn:li:person:SJJTesdMSy), #CIO de @[Deutsche Bank International Private Bank](urn:li:organization:54331860) en España, ha analizado, la economía en Canal 24 Horas de @[Radiotelevisión Española](urn:li:organization:9869703) junto al economista @[José Carlos Díez Gangas](urn:li:person:lwSITbKXQe).    Durante el programa, @[Rosa Duce Tello](urn:li:person:SJJTesdMSy) ha explicado que, a pesar de que la #economía mejora, la inflación y los tipos de interés siguen afectando al consumo de las familias. “Los bancos centrales han subido los tipos de interés con una #política fiscal expansiva, lo que complica el escenario y los resultados. Idealmente, la política fiscal debería de estar planteada de forma quirúrgica para que esté más dirigido a quienes más lo necesiten” explica Rosa. https://lnkd.in/d22uZZbr

@[Kamran Khan](urn:li:person:I2jYhsFu6O) is bullish on India’s ability to capture the market opportunities associated with the global sustainability movement. “When we talk about ESG in a country like India, ‘challenge’ is not the operative word. It should be ‘opportunity’,” says our Asia Pacific Head of Environmental, Social and Governance \(#ESG\). India is marching decisively towards these opportunities, Khan told @[Forbes India](urn:li:organization:10875167), citing several positive developments in the country, such as the sustainability provisions in India’s Union Budget, development of green hydrogen and sustainability agriculture.   “Given the level of talent in India, it could very easily become the biggest market of sustainable finance or sustainable technology expertise in the world,” he adds. You can read the full article here: http://deu.ba/60444ijYa   #SustainableFinance #IndianEconomy #GreenFinance

Today, we open a new chapter for the Private Bank – one of our four core business areas -- under the leadership of @[Claudio de Sanctis](urn:li:person:HvYq5k0l_r). Until now, the Private Bank consisted of two separate business units, Private Bank Germany \(PB GY\) and the @[Deutsche Bank International Private Bank](urn:li:organization:54331860) \(IPB\):    ☑️ PB GY successfully integrated the retail businesses of Deutsche Bank and Postbank in Germany and has just unified its IT infrastructure. It adapted to changing customer behaviour, while revenues grew via successful expansion of the loan book and significant growth of assets under management.  ☑️ IPB, created in 2020, successfully developed a new market positioning for our international retail and wealth management business, with notable success through our flagship branches and Bank for Entrepreneurs.   Going forward, our clients will be served by five client coverage areas, which will be supported by central functions: 1️⃣ Wealth Management and Private Banking Germany 2️⃣ Personal Banking Germany 3️⃣ Private Bank Emerging Markets 4️⃣ Private Bank Italy, Spain and Belgium 5️⃣ Private Bank Central Europe and US   The overarching rationale for the changes centre around three principles:  👉 Serving our clients by region and proposition, to serve them in a more targeted and effective way right across the Private Bank.  👉 Further streamlining our organisation to become leaner, faster and more agile, freeing up resources for investment and growth.  👉 Centralising functions to foster a “One Private Bank” mindset where every area benefits from improvements, and risk and controls span across the entire organisation.    We look forward to meeting the needs of our valued clients in this set-up even better in the future and take you all with us on this journey.   #privatebank #growth #deutschebank #globalhausbank

Becoming new parents is like embarking on a great big adventure which bring with it many joys. At the same time, the novel experience may overwhelm new parents, making it difficult to fully appreciate this journey. In such cases, finding the support groups to discuss common topics and shared experiences makes the journey easier for many.  Our Proud Parent employee resource group in India helps new parents bridge this gap. Through focused interventions and a strong support network, they support expecting and new parents as they navigate their careers and parenthood. Recently 70 of our new parents came together at a networking session to celebrate their happiness and make new connections. Along with some fun activities, our team also reiterated the bank’s benefits and policies that make the parenting journey easier on new parents.  Find out more about our wide range of benefits: http://deu.ba/60404icvO  #holisticwellness #Parenting #DiversityandInclusion

Our colleagues in Hong Kong joined forces to bring a canvas to life, as we commemorate our 65th anniversary in the vibrant city of Hong Kong! 🎉 🎨   Each colleague’s fingerprint represents a shared victory imprinted onto the canvas, as we reflect on our journey in Hong Kong.  Deutsche Bank first opened its first post-war branch in Hong Kong in 1958 as Deutsch-Asiatische Bank \(DAB\). Today, Hong Kong is one of our dual headquarters in the Asia Pacific region and a key market for connecting our clients across the region and globally.   For more than 150 years we have been creating a positive impact on our clients, staff, and communities in Asia Pacific. Visit db.com/apac150 to learn about Deutsche Bank’s extraordinary journey in Asia Pacific.   Our global and regional leaders in the bank unveiled the 65th anniversary artwork this week at our Hong Kong office during an employee event to mark this important milestone. We at Deutsche Bank want to push innovation further and motivate our colleagues to embrace technology and change. Deutsche Bank Global Hackathon 2023 does both. 🦾  How does it work? Over 1,700 technology enthusiasts have signed up across 18 locations for our 24-today hour global hackathon launching 13 July, 13:00 GMT. The challenge for the teams is to make use of the many possibilities artificial intelligence has to offer and envision ways in which it can be used to drive digital change in our banking and internal processes. Their task is to develop a functioning application prototype and present it to the hackathon jury.  The global 24-hour hackathon established back in 2016 is open to all Deutsche Bank employees regardless of technical ability or hackathon experience. Participants will form teams and will compete for the prestigious ‘Hack I.T.’ trophy. And they will also tweet about their results.  So, follow the teams on #dbtechhackathon on LinkedIn and Twitter.  #innovation #technology #artificialintelligence #banking #deutschebank @[Deutsche Bank Technology, Data & Innovation](urn:li:organization:71537830)

When Shivani, who lives in Jaipur, India, turned 16 two years ago, she had the daunting challenge of contributing to her family income. Her father, the sole breadwinner of the family, lost his job during the pandemic, and had to resort to daily wage labour. Unfortunately, this meant that Shivani could not afford to continue her education after the 10th grade.  However, through our support of the Saksham programme run by @[Plan\_India](urn:li:organization:2365206), we provide youth like Shivani with a chance for a better future. As a result of her training, Shivani gained valuable communication skills, improved her overall confidence, and is now employed as a General Duty Assistant at a hospital in her city. She is also pursuing her higher studies. Over the last seven years, we have supported the vocational training of over 16,500 youth. 🙏   The stories of millions of Indian youth are often similar. About one in three youth in the country are unemployed either due to societal pressure or the lack of resources. On #WorldYouthSkillsDay, we celebrate the educators who provide better opportunities to India’s future generation. 👏   Our engineering scholarships for women, through @[Smile Foundation](urn:li:organization:521390), support the aspirations of 300 talented young girls from marginalised backgrounds, and offer them a chance to fulfil their dreams. 🧡   👉 Find out more here: http://deu.ba/60494iohN  #WorldYouthSkillsDay #dbBorntoBe #PositiveImpact

Sometimes our role in a meeting is unclear, or we are invited as a substitute for a colleague but have little insight into the subject matter. 🤔   Whether you are a “required” or “optional” attendee at a meeting, by responding with a firm “yes” or ”no”, you will allow the host to plan accordingly. When they know who will and will not attend, your role will be clear and will help to ensure the meeting objective is met. In cases where you can’t attend a meeting due to time conflicts or you’d like to keep track of the meeting, you can still keep the meeting in your calendar after declining. Here’s how.  Any other ideas how to rock our calendars? Feel free to comment! ✍️  #MeetingCulture #Culture #MondayMeetingChallenge #DeutscheBank

With increasing regional trade integration across Asia, @[Matthew Moodey](urn:li:person:VeqlE1hfy4) believes that supporting small and medium-sized enterprises \(SMEs\) with their supply chain finance requirements is an important focus for Deutsche Bank in the region. "We see new investors entering this space and continued innovation," our newly appointed APAC head of Trade Finance and Lending told Corporate Treasurer.   Initiatives like the Comprehensive and Progressive for Trans-Pacific Partnership \(CPTPP\) help deepen economic cooperation and trade links between Asian countries, he adds.   Having joined Deutsche Bank in 2007, Matthew served in several leadership roles within our corporate banking and investment banking businesses. Most recently he was responsible for financial sponsors and debt products in Australia, as well as leading Natural Resource Financing and Structured Trade Finance teams across the region.  We wish Matthew and his team the very best!  You can read the full article if you are a CT subscriber: https://lnkd.in/diz7SE-8  @[Deutsche Bank Corporate Bank](urn:li:organization:38166507)  #TeamDBAPAC #TradeFinance #SME #SupplyChain

Do you sometimes wonder why you are invited to a meeting? 💡 Getting a meeting together with the right attendees can be a challenge. We’ve presumably all been invited to meetings where we wondered: why me? You might even have a colleague in mind who you think would be in a much better position to talk about this topic or request. In cases like that, we often just forward a meeting invite without informing the host or other participants – and a three-person meeting can fast turn into an eight-person one. This can lead to confusion on all sides. The host is left wondering why more people joined the meeting than expected; the participants are unclear about their roles and if they are really welcome at the meeting.   Today’s Monday Meeting Challenge encourages you to avoid this by planning meetings carefully and thoughtfully. Think about who should be required to join and what their role will be and discuss this with the host.  Our tip for you is to briefly distinguish between roles and inform your colleagues about expectations:  👉 Decision makers: colleagues who need to attend meetings to take a decision 👉 Collaborators: colleagues who need to attend a meeting to facilitate brainstorming or solution approaches  👉 Listeners: colleagues who are asked to listen in to learn or document the meeting outcomes.   The clearer you are on what roles everyone in the meeting will play, the more likely your meeting will achieve the objective.   Any other ideas how to rock our calendars? Feel free to comment! ✍️  #MeetingCulture #Culture #MondayMeetingChallenge #DeutscheBank

Congratulations to @[Hua Han Ong](urn:li:person:GBVMqG5BO0) for being appointed as a Nominated Member of Parliament \(NMP\) in Singapore, for his exceptional work in promoting disability inclusion. In 2023 Deutsche Bank celebrates its 150th anniversary in the UK. Here are some of the bank’s important milestones that we are marking for this special occasion.  https://www.db.com/uk150   #dbUK150 #PositiveImpact

Deutsche Bank's UK story began in 1873   150 years ago, the bank opened its first European office outside Germany. Known as the Deutsche Bank London Agency, this office was central to the growth of the bank’s international business. In 1976, after the two World Wars, London became the bank’s first overseas branch to reopen. Our UK connection is now stronger than ever. London has been essential for our global investment banking and trading operations for almost fifty years. And in 2007 we expanded beyond the capital, establishing an operational centre in Birmingham.   150 years later, we look back on some key milestones.   https://www.db.com/uk150   #dbUK150 #PositiveImpact

From financing the upgrade of sewage systems to selling bonds to fund the national health service, we help build the infrastructure behind everyday life in the UK. Our recent project, the Tideway Thames Tunnel, is a £4.4bn upgrade to London's sewer system that will protect Londoners from environmental hazards for the next 100 years. By purifying rainwater and using sewage to generate renewable energy, this 15-mile tunnel will make the Thames river and its surrounding communities cleaner and safer. We're proud to support our clients on projects like this and many others, including Rock Rail who have helped to modernise the UK's rail network with state-of-the-art trains.   https://www.db.com/uk150   #dbUK150 #PositiveImpact

Watch our 2023 Annual General Meeting! 🔛  The Annual General Meeting is one of the most important days of the year for us – reflecting on the previous year, our achievements, the way ahead and of course discussing a wide range of topics with our shareholders. As our Chairman of the Supervisory Board Alex Wynaendts outlines today, 2022 was – on balance – a most successful year for our bank. That is more pleasing as 2022 was the benchmark year for us meeting our objectives. Some key numbers:   ▶️ We are proposing a dividend of 30 cents per share – that is 10 cents more than last year. ▶️ Pre-tax profit was 5.6 billion euros in 2022, 65 percent higher than in the previous year. And at 5.7 billion euros, our net profit more than doubled. ▶️ Behind all this is the commitment lies the passion and the unwavering commitment of approximately 85,000 people who work at Deutsche Bank.    Our CEO @[Christian Sewing](urn:li:person:8kw5JTdFVj) emphasizes in his speech: "Based on the success of 2022 and what was another very strong first quarter of 2023 – with the best result in 10 years – we are confident of being able to achieve even more." He adds "We are dedicated to our clients’ lasting success and financial security – in our home market in Germany, in Europe and all over the world."    And that is exactly the purpose for which all of us at Deutsche Bank give our best every day! 🙏🏻   Click here to watch the live stream: https://lnkd.in/eJRVTRVm   +++ Video with impressions in comments +++   You can find all relevant AGM materials on our website, where will we also upload our voting results later today: https://agm.db.com.    #Banking #Finance #DeutscheBank #AnnualGeneralMeeting #dbAGM

There is no mountain high enough, for our employees 🏔  Battling winds, bone-chilling temperatures of minus 12 degrees Celsius, and surviving with only 57 percent of oxygen at an altitude of over 13,800 feet: @[Hrishikesh Deshpande](urn:li:person:QZ6OjuEixm) accomplished something extraordinary earlier this year. He successfully completed a 21.9-kilometer half-marathon on a frozen lake in Pangong Tso, Ladakh, contributing to a world record.  This remarkable achievement marks India's first and the world's highest frozen lake half marathon, a feat that is officially registered in the Guinness World Records. 🏅  Hrishikesh, a member of our @[Deutsche Bank Technology, Data & Innovation](urn:li:organization:71537830) team in Pune, is not only an avid hiker and motorcycling enthusiast but also a firm believer in the mental clarity and resilience that fitness brings. He shares: “This experience was unlike any other. In the first couple of kilometers, my eyes watered, and breathing was painful due to the biting cold and lack of oxygen. But soon after, it was one foot before the other, until the finish line.”  He is now readying himself for Zanskar Valley in Ladakh, where he hopes to visit Phuktal Gompa, a 2,500-year-old Buddhist monastery.  Congratulations, Hrishikesh, on this amazing achievement and all the best for your next projects – inside and outside the bank!  Explore how we create an environment that allows everyone to unleash their full potential: https://lnkd.in/eX-kXQCx   #GuinessWorldRecord #MoreThanBanking #financecareers #DeutscheBank #technologycareers

Did you know that 36% of the EU’s total greenhouse gas emissions comes from buildings? 🌎🏦  Meeting this challenge is vital if we’re to meet our net zero targets and prevent catastrophic climate change. Deutsche Bank is determined to play its part – and today, we’re publishing our sustainability strategy for residential real estate. It can cost more than 100,000 Euro to renovate an existing home to meet future EU energy efficiency standards - a major challenge for homeowners. We calculate the cost to our private real estate clients at around € 80 billion.  In our white paper “Residential Real Estate – Leading to Net Zero”, among others, we address the following points:  ✅ We describe how we aim to help homeowners meet this challenge with a unique package of financial support and comprehensive information.  ✅ Our Private Bank’s target is for 12 billion Euro in new business volumes by the end of 2023.  ✅ We also describe how we’re partnering with industry sectors which supply energy, and building materials, to the real estate sector, to reduce carbon emissions across the building life cycle.  For the first time, we are publishing the financed emissions of our € 175 billion EU residential real estate portfolio which accounts for around 40% of our total loan book. As a result, we have now published financed emissions data for around 60% of our entire loan portfolio.   👉 Read more here: https://lnkd.in/dvW-5g4N    #GasEmission #ESG #NetZero #DeutscheBank #PositiveImpact

Hoy hemos presentado el último informe CIO Insights donde hemos analizado las #PerspectivasEconómicas y estrategias de inversión para el segundo semestre del año de la mano de @[Rosa Duce Tello](urn:li:person:SJJTesdMSy), CIO, y @[Alejandro Vidal Crespo](urn:li:person:PqFRXLLKcl), Head Investment Manager de Deutsche Bank. Nuestros expertos pronostican un crecimiento del 1,9% en 2023, para España, gracias a la reducción de precios energéticos y el impulso de las exportaciones. La inflación se prevé que finalice en el 5,7% en la Eurozona y 4,3% en EE. UU. “La evolución más favorable de la #inflación y las perspectivas de recesión en EEUU colocan a la #Fed al final del camino en el ciclo de subidas de tipos de interés \(sólo podría haber una subida más, en todo caso, en julio\), mientras que el #BCE podría subir los tipos otros 25 pb en cada una de las dos próximas reuniones, situando los tipos de interés oficiales \(tipo refi\) en el 4,5%”, añade @[Rosa Duce Tello](urn:li:person:SJJTesdMSy). En renta fija, se apuesta por bonos públicos y corporativos de calidad que ofrecen por primera vez desde la crisis financiera. “Los bonos con Grado de Inversión están bien soportados tanto en EEUU como en Europa, explica @[Alejandro Vidal Crespo](urn:li:person:PqFRXLLKcl). Además, se espera volatilidad en renta variable y mayores rendimientos en bonos públicos. #CrecimientoEconómico #Perspectivas2023

El pasado fin de semana, cerca de 90 #voluntariosDB se reunieron para contribuir de manera activa a la protección y conservación de las aves locales. El proyecto, en colaboración con @[SEO/BirdLife](urn:li:organization:10470580), tuvo como objetivo construir y colocar cajas nido en los árboles para proporcionar refugio seguro a las aves en áreas urbanas.   Bajo la guía de expertos de SeoBirdlife, los voluntarios aprendieron sobre las aves locales y la importancia de las cajas nido como hábitats artificiales. A través de un proceso de construcción en equipo, se proporcionaron instrucciones y materiales para ensamblar las cajas nido de manera adecuada y que los pájaros trogloditas puedan anidar aquí.   ¡Orgullosos de nuestro equipo!

Children who are battling cancer have to demonstrate courage beyond their years as they navigate the challenges of their journey. For many of these young warriors, the side effects of cancer treatments, such as chemotherapy, lead to hair loss.    For 195 of our colleagues in Asia Pacific, hair was something they were willing to lose to help create awareness about childhood cancer, and raise funds for supporting children with cancer.  Last Friday, they shaved their heads at fundraiser events held at our offices in Singapore, Hong Kong, India, Sri Lanka and Thailand, as part of Deutsche Bank’s #CSR Plus You employee giving initiative. Funds raised will be used to support treatment and emotional support programs for children with cancer, as well as fund cancer research.   First held in Singapore in 2014 as part of Children’s Cancer Foundation’s Hair for Hope event, the annual fundraiser has expanded to include other charities in the region, including St. Baldrick’s Foundation, CanKids…KidsCan in India, and Ramathibodi Foundation in Thailand.  @[CCF Singapore](urn:li:organization:14553356) @[CanKids KidsCan](urn:li:organization:1598170) @[St. Baldrick's Foundation](urn:li:organization:758762)   #dbPlusYou #PositiveImpact #HairforHope2023

🙋 Easy durch den Finanzalltag: Heute haben wir uns über großes Gewusel und junge Besucher in unserer Zentrale in Frankfurt gefreut.   Rund 250 Schülerinnen und Schüler waren bei uns zu Gast und tankten in 90-minütigen Jobstarter-Workshops praktisches Finanzwissen – lebensnah, verständlich und alles andere als langweilig. In einem Vortrag wurden zudem Ausbildungs- und Studienmöglichkeiten aufgezeigt. Die Veranstaltung war der Abschluss der diesjährigen „So geht Geld“- Schultour, bei der in den vergangenen vier Wochen wieder fast 100 unserer Kolleginnen und Kollegen ihr Finanzwissen mit mehr als 6.000 Schülerinnen und Schülern aus ganz Deutschland geteilt haben. Seit 2021 haben sie bereits mehr als 40.000 Jugendliche in rund 1.700 Unterrichtsbesuchen für Konto-, Spar- und Anlagethemen begeistert.   Vielen Dank an die 10 Schulkassen und ihre Lehrkräfte für das große Interesse, an @[Lars Stoy](urn:li:person:gOyViG4pKH) und @[Steffen Große Enking](urn:li:person:VXr55QHwaK) für die Begrüßung und Moderation und an unsere Referent\*innen @[Katja Hain](urn:li:person:KoaukDGa3l), @[Benjamin Alka, CFA](urn:li:person:Z9YRVaDZ4h), @[Markus H.-P. Müller](urn:li:person:RFJIrO2j05), Markus Schäfer und @[Stefanos Tzoumerkiotis](urn:li:person:q-dWjdGd3X).   Mehr unter: https://lnkd.in/eRCkcW-7. #SoGehtGeld #PositiverBeitrag #dbBorntoBe #FinanzielleAllgemeinbildung

In der Schule trotz Hitzefrei? 💦 Statt Abkühlung im Schwimmbad zu suchen, nahmen gestern 60 Schülerinnen und Schüler der 9. Klassen der Schillerschule in Frankfurt an unserem @[Baut Eure Zukunft](urn:li:organization:27095288)-Camp teil. Was bedeutet Demokratie an unserer Schule? Wie können wir Mitbestimmung fördern? Diese wichtigen Fragen standen auf dem etwas anderen Stundenplan: In Design Thinking-Workshops wurden kreative Ideen entwickelt, über Demokratie diskutiert, Interviews geführt und tolle Prototypen gebastelt.   Am Ende des Tages präsentierten die Teams 10 innovative und umsetzbare Ideen für einen demokratischen Schulalltag u.a. vor einem Teil des Kollegiums der Schillerschule. Begleitet wurden sie an diesem Tag von unserem Projektpartner Social Impact, Trainer\*innen und Mitarbeitenden der Deutschen Bank, die sich als Mentor\*innen engagiert haben.   Das Projekt Baut Eure Zukunft, das gemeinsam mit der Deutsche Bank Stiftung und Social Impact ins Leben gerufen wurde, will die Potenziale von Schüler\*innen fördern und ermutigt sie dazu, drängende Probleme in ihrem Umfeld anzugehen. As part of our CSR environmental impact programme, How We Live, we have committed to plant 50,000 fruit-bearing trees in villages in India this year, supported by our NGO partner, @[Swades Foundation](urn:li:organization:3648594). 🌱   Over two weekends in July, over 150 motivated volunteers sowed some of these saplings. With this plantation, Deutsche Bank has planted 150,000 trees in the region, over the last three years. As a result, farmers are estimated to receive an additional income of 75-100 million rupees \(\~800,000 to \~1,000,000 euros\) per year, after three years, and the partnership aims to reduce 1,500 metric tonnes of carbon dioxide annually.    #TreePlantationDrive #dbHowWeLive #PositiveImpact

Wer hat Fernweh und denkt schon heute an den nächsten Urlaub? ⛱️ Passend zur anstehenden Urlaubszeit haben wir heute ein paar Schätze aus den Tiefen unseres historischen Archivs hervorgeholt. Denn so lange ist das Urlauben noch gar keine Selbstverständlichkeit.  Erst zu Beginn des westdeutschen Wirtschaftswunders der Nachkriegszeit fingen die Leute an, mehr und mehr ins Ausland zu reisen. An Fernreisen war damals noch nicht zu denken, aber Nachbarländer wie Italien, Spanien, Niederlande, Schweiz und Österreich waren bereits begehrte Ziele.  In den 1950er brauchten deutsche Touristen ausländische Währungen oder Reiseschecks. Banken waren die Hauptanlaufstelle für den Wechsel in ausländische Devisen. So warb auch die Rheinisch-Westfälische Bank dafür, unter deren Namen die Deutsche Bank in Westdeutschland damals für einige Jahre firmierte.  Unsere monatliche Reihe Timeless Treasures ist eine Momentaufnahme und ein Juwel aus vergangenen Tagen - präsentiert vom Historischen Institut der Deutschen Bank.  In diesem Sinne: Eine schöne Urlaubszeit!  #timelesstreasures #history #deutschebank

In partnership with Deutsche Bank UK Charity of the Year, @[MQ Mental Health Research](urn:li:organization:5204142), dbPride UKI the bank’s employee resource group for LGBTQI colleagues and their allies took to the River Thames for the annual flagship fundraising event. Deutsche Bank colleagues proudly raised an £36,920, an incredible amount to support MQ’s work creating a world where mental illness is better understood, effectively treated, and one day prevented.   @[Rebecca Short](urn:li:person:R0Sn9wFfch), Chief Operating Officer and Member of the Management Board, said “The LGBTQI community continues to face both subtle and overt discrimination and prejudice in their daily lives. These experiences can lead to a higher risk of mental health conditions like depression and anxiety disorders. That’s why the work of MQ Mental Health Research to better understand, diagnose and treat mental illness is so important.”   Thanks to the team at MQ Mental Health Research, dbPride UKI and all of our colleagues who invested so much time and energy in making it a truly special evening.  #dbPride #MoreThanBanking #InclusiveCulture #PositiveImpact

NASA's Artemis space mission is taking humans back to the moon - and beyond, towards Mars. We are proud that bearings from Schaeffler Aerospace play a vital role in this exciting journey. 🚀  Incorporating 20 high-precision Schaeffler bearings into the turbopumps of the 4 main rocket engines, the main shafts can rotate at speeds of up to 35,000 rpm. This helps the Core stage of the Space Launch System (SLS) in producing 2 million pounds of thrust by burning a mix of liquid hydrogen and liquid oxygen. 🔥💨  #Wepioneermotion #Artemis  NASA - National Aeronautics and Space Administration  Photo credit: NASA | Joel Kowsky

El pasado domingo 6 de noviembre, Schaeffler Iberia estuvo presente en uno de los eventos solidarios más importantes del año, la Carrera de la Mujer en Barcelona, en la que el equipo de empleadas de la organización participaron bajo el lema: “hoy y siempre, juntas llegamos más lejos”. Conjuntamente, con otras 32.000 mujeres inscritas, completaron los 8 km de recorrido bañando las calles de la ciudad en una “marea rosa” solidaria.   Schaeffler, con su inscripción en el evento, colabora con las distintas causas benéficas y sociales que se apoyan a través de este, las cuales van, entre otras, desde la lucha contra el cáncer, contra la violencia de género en todas sus formas, o el apoyo a proyectos de investigación. En total, gracias al más de un millón de participantes en todas sus pruebas, este año la carrera de la mujer ha recaudado casi un millón y medio de euros para dar soporte a estas causas.   La participación en este evento ya es un imprescindible para el equipo Schaeffler, no solo por la magnitud de la causa, que afecta a todas de alguna manera en mayor o menor medida, sino también por la importancia de compartir momentos como este de manera conjunta con compañeras de trabajo, potenciando así las relaciones humanas e impulsando el trabajo en equipo.   ¡Bien hecho chicas, juntas llegáis más lejos!  #carreradelamujer #WeAreSchaeffler

Avec l’arrivée de Frédéric Fouquet en tant que Responsable de Région Sud et Tom Mocquet en tant que Responsable de Secteur sur une partie de la région Occitane, la Division Automotive Aftermarket France de l’équipementier automobile et industriel mondial Schaeffler renforce sa présence sur le territoire pour mieux répondre aux besoins de ses clients. Son dernier poste occupé chez Mann Filter durant 8 ans confirme son expertise sur le secteur Sud-Ouest avec une plus-value dans le secteur du Poids-Lourd. Depuis le 1er septembre dernier, il occupe la fonction de Responsable de Région Sud pour la Division Automotive Aftermarket de Schaeffler France. Il sera secondé, entre autres, par Tom Mocquet, nouvel arrivant en charge des départements tels que les Pyrénées-Orientales ou encore la Haute Garonne. Fort d’une expertise dans le secteur du Poids-Lourd chez Autodistribution Poids-Lourd à Floirac pendant deux ans. Cette nouvelle organisation est basée sur la découpe de la France entre une zone Nord gérée par Dominique Pochet et une zone Sud par Frédéric Fouquet. Our Wooster, Ohio, campus recently welcomed The University of Akron (UA) President, Gary Miller. During his visit he met with Schaeffler representatives and discussed the deep partnership Schaeffler and the university share. More than 50 percent of Wooster's Product Development Team are UA graduates. He also toured the plant and the Competence Center where he met with UA students who are also enrolled in Schaeffler's Cooperative (Co-Op) Education Program. We're excited to continue working with The University of Akron as we partner to develop the next generation of Schaeffler employees that pioneer motion!

Por primera vez, Schaeffler México fue reconocido dentro del evento GPF (Global Production Forum), ¡planta Puebla recibió el SPS Optimal Technology Award! Schaeffler otorga este premio a los mejores segmentos con una reducción positiva en sus indicadores. El Segmento Operaciones de Puebla fue nominado, y posteriormente galardonado, gracias a que lograron reducir su tiempo de 45 a 28 minutos; aplicando la metodología SMED y siguiendo los conceptos de SPS. Todos los segmentos estuvieron involucrados en dicho proceso, además de contar con el soporte de los departamentos de Ingeniería Industrial, Mantenimiento y SPS.   Extendemos nuestras felicitaciones a todo el equipo que consiguió este premio, dejando a Puebla y a todo Schaeffler México en lo alto. ¡Felicidades!

Today is #HumanRightsDay and it concerns all of us, without exception! 🤝  We also take the issue of human rights very seriously. As part of our "Schaeffler Human Rights Dialog", experts from Schaeffler met with external stakeholders from NGOs, customers, suppliers, peers and science. We use the open exchange as an opportunity to improve our human rights approach, our processes, and our management systems. The event focused on our Human Rights Compliance Management System, which addresses human rights due diligence across the entire value chain. In his key note, Professor Krajewski emphasized that companies should rethink their purpose in terms of social responsibility and human rights in order to be successful in the long run. Respect for human rights is an integral part of the Schaeffler Group's corporate responsibility. This principle is firmly anchored in our Code of Conduct. You can find more information on the topic of human rights here: https://bit.ly/3FgU0wv   #WeAreSchaeffler #HumanRightsDay #humanrights

Kde nájdete TOP inštruktorov duálneho vzdelávania na Slovensku? No predsa v Schaeffler Kysuce a Schaeffler Skalica.  Aktuálne to hovoria výsledky podujatia Učíme sa navzájom, ktoré organizuje Asociácia priemyselných zväzov a dopravy. Naši 3 kolegovia sa umiestnili hneď v 2 kategóriách:  🔝 Kategória skúsený hlavný inštruktor: 🥇 1. Monika Žideková, Schaeffler Kysuce (639 hlasov) 🥈 2. Martin Polák, Schaeffler Skalica (445 hlasov)  🔝 Kategória začínajúci hlavný inštruktor: 🥈 2. Igor Flajžík, Schaeffler Skalica (537 hlasov)  Schaeffler dlhodobo buduje kvalitný systém duálneho vzdelávania pre žiakov stredných škôl a sme radi, že ho môžeme budovať s ich profesionálnou pomocou a zanietením. Naši kolegovia si plne zaslúžia toto ocenenie a sme hrdí, že sú súčasťou nášho tímu. Ešte raz gratulujeme!  Viacerí deviataci rozmýšľajú práve v týchto dňoch nad výberom svojej strednej školy. Ak máte doma deviataka alebo poznáte niekoho, koho baví technika, určite mu dajte vedieť o našom duálnom vzdelávaní, kde sa s našimi inštruktormi môže stretnúť:  👉 Schaeffler Kysucké Nové Mesto – https://dualkysuce.sk/ 👉 Schaeffler Skalica - https://dualskalica.sk/  #WeAreSchaeffler

Pred rokom sme v Schaeffler Kysuce slávnostne položili základný kameň nového výskumného a vývojového centra. A dnes už stojí hrubá stavba so štyrmi podlažiami a v interiéri prebiehajú dokončovacie práce. Centrum je navrhnuté podľa koncepcie Schaeffler New Work, ktorá podporuje agilný spôsob práce, väčšiu flexibilitu a interakciu medzi tímami.  Súčasťou centra budú:  👉 zaujímavo riešené kancelárie a spoločné priestory  👉 udržateľné technológie  👉 átrium so zelenou strechou  Veríme, že centrum v priebehu budúceho roka 2023 privíta nielen súčasných, ale aj nových kolegov, ktorí majú chuť pracovať na inovatívnych riešeniach v oblasti elektromobility pre automobilové spoločnosti z celého sveta.  #WeAreSchaeffler #Wepioneermotion

Schaeffler is actively supporting the energy transition, with innovative, highly efficient electrolyzers for hydrogen production. Our electrolysis stacks use polymer electrolyte membrane technology \(PEM\) and are especially suitable for the R&D segment and for industrial use. Four different Hydron PowerStacks are already available. Schaeffler India’s Water ATM initiative to provide Cost-friendly, Clean and Safe Drinking Water to over 735 Families of Savli Villages.  The villages in and around Savli were facing drinking water availability and cost/quality issues around drinking water \(TDS level of 1100+\). With an intend to contribute our bit towards resolving this issue, Schaeffler India recently inaugurated its Water ATM project in Savli.   Inaugurated on December 31, 2022 and launched in association with implementation partner Creation Foundation, the project is implemented in 2 villages \(Lasundra & Bahutha\) Savli to start with and focuses on providing safe and clean drinking water at a nominal rate to around 3700 beneficiaries /735+ families of these villages.  Schaeffler India deeply values the efforts of all team members associated with the project and is looking at favorable outcomes in terms of easing-away the hassles and cost/quality issues associated with drinking water while ensuring good health of people living in the villages of Savli, Vadodara.   @[Santanu Ghoshal](urn:li:person:LKd_ppyIbd) @[Yogesh Kapse](urn:li:person:iZMwLSfVlF) @[Jayaprakash \(JP\) Nair](urn:li:person:pZSV0efeTQ) @[Yash Doshi](urn:li:person:dvFE5L6gbk) @[Mallikharjuna Evani](urn:li:person:655BaV2RSB)  {hashtag|\#|SchaefflerIndia} {hashtag|\#|WeareSchaeffler} {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion}

Schaeffler India's Mobile Science Lab Project to Benefit Students of 28 Government Schools around Vadodara. December 31, 2022, marked the inauguration of another CSR initiative of Schaeffler India - 'The Mobile Science Lab' or MSL, a fully equipped science lab on wheels with trained instructors that offers learning opportunities to students in remote areas. The project presently consists of 2 MSL Vans and will be implemented across 28 Government schools in and around Savli and Maneja areas.  In collaboration with implementation partner Agastya International Foundation, this Schaeffler project was inaugurated by Mr. Mallikharjuna Evani, Plant Head Savli at the Lok Vidyalaya School, Lamdapura, Savli, Vadodara. With this project, Schaeffler India intends to create awareness of science and boost participation in science-based educational events, programs, and camps amongst students, besides providing concept training to teachers on the same.  Schaeffler India congratulates the team behind the initiative and looks forward to a favorable outcome in terms of educational awareness at grassroot level, particularly the remote areas in and around Vadodara.  {hashtag|\#|WeareSchaeffler} {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion} {hashtag|\#|SchaefflerIndia}

How can wind turbines be made even more powerful and reliable? 🤔   After pondering this question, we came up with the solution in the form of our asymmetrical spherical roller bearing. The rotor shaft bearing arrangement is, after all, of central importance, a fact that is particularly true of high-performance installations, in which the locating bearings are exposed to particularly high loads.  The asymmetrical spherical roller bearings developed by us protect against high axial loads while maintaining angular adjustability. The bearings are interchangeable with standard bearings but have a different contact angle. The load distribution between the two rows of bearings is improved, pressure and frictional torque are reduced, and axial rigidity is increased by around 50 percent. The unique design also improves rolling motion while minimizing sliding motion.  Find out more about our solutions for reliable rotor bearing arrangements in wind turbines in our Customer Success Story: https://bit.ly/3iU0IRO  {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion} {hashtag|\#|Bearings} {hashtag|\#|SphericalRollerBearings} {hashtag|\#|WindTurbines} {hashtag|\#|WindPower}

@[Ewellix](urn:li:organization:28861681) este oficial parte a Grupului @[Schaeffler](urn:li:organization:305287)! La finalul anului 2022, Schaeffler a finalizat achiziția Ewellix, producător și furnizor global de componente și sisteme pentru tehnologia liniară, iar aceasta gama de produse va completa portofoliul de produse Schaeffler. Echipa segmentului de liniar de la Brașov va fi parte activă în acest proces de migratie, prin care compania noastră va deveni mai inovativă, mai agilă și mai eficientă.   În contextul noii achiziții, joi, 12 ianuarie, a avut loc un eveniment global, care a marcat startul acestei migrații. Evenimentul s-a desfășurat în mai multe locații din Grupul Schaeffler, unde exista producție de componente de tehnica liniara, inclusiv în fabrica noastră, respectiv in cadrul Segmentului 01. {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion}

At 947 meters long, with tremendous exposure to water pressure, and the requirement for reliable, ongoing maneuverability of the heavy gates –  the new dam construction on the Vietnamese Trà Khúc River was a project characterized by extreme operating conditions. 😲🌊 With our maintenance-free spherical plain bearings for the segment gates of the giant dam, we have delivered a solution that can accommodate these requirements to excellent effect.  The bearings used are provided with a special sliding layer, which is applied to the outer ring, and therefore do not require any lubrication. They reliably withstand the high physical loads and, thanks to low coefficients of friction, additionally boast a long service life. An additional seal also provides protection against contamination.  You can read all about our maintenance-free spherical plain bearings here in our Customer Success Story on the dam on the Trà Khúc River in Vietnam: https://bit.ly/3H9ZLwX  {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion} {hashtag|\#|Bearings}

With collective industry expertise on board, the Schaeffler Lifetime Solutions Showtruck will be stopping at the “Switzerland Maintenance Days”. Find out how to rev up your maintenance and repairs in Biel/Bienne, Switzerland, on 7 March 2023. Participation is free but a registration is required.  In three modules on the topics of condition monitoring, lubrication supply systems, and maintenance tools, you will learn from presentations and success stories how your machines can run as smoothly in the future as they do today. You can also gain hands-on experience in the workplaces and the experts from Schaeffler and UIKER Antriebstechnik AG will be available to answer your questions. Náš hydrostatický modulárny pohon zo sériovej výroby sa dostal až na preterskú dráhu. 🏎️  Svoju premiéru mal s jazdcom Marcom Wittmannom, ktorý súťaží so zeleným modelom Schaeffler BMW M4 GT3 {hashtag|\#|Greenmachine}. 💚  Vďaka extrémne rýchlej odozve modulárneho aktuátora spojky môže jazdec rýchlejšie odštartovať, a tým získa cenné sekundy! Systém pohonu prispieva aj k vyššej účinnosti motora a zníženiu emisií CO2.  👉 Viac o tejto technickej inovácii sa dozviete na: https://bit.ly/3X9eChj    {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion} {hashtag|\#|WhyWeRace} {hashtag|\#|WeAreSchaeffler}

We are committed to a sustainable future! 🌱 That is why we want to expand our production sustainably, make greater use of climate-friendly materials and develop innovative products that enable us all to have a future worth living in.  In our {hashtag|\#|Roadmap2025} we have set ourselves the following goals:  ▶️ Renewable energy: 100 percent of our purchased electricity will be generated from renewable sources by 2024.  ▶️ Climate-neutral production: By 2030 we will reduce our CO₂ emissions in our own production  ▶️ Climate-neutral supply chain: By 2040 we will reduce the CO₂ emissions in our supply chain  More information about our strategy and the Roadmap2025: https://bit.ly/3WV6ZdS  {hashtag|\#|GreenMakesTheDifference} {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion}  {hashtag|\#|sustainability}

Product and brand piracy is a lucrative business worth billions and a serious threat to the economy and consumers. The recently awarded negative prize “Plagiarius” draws attention to this. Last year, a deceptively real counterfeit of our double-row axial angular ball bearing was also “awarded”.   At first glance, the original and the counterfeits are often indistinguishable.👁️ Built-in counterfeit products can, however, have devastating consequences in an emergency, because many of our products have a security-relevant function. Therefore, it is better to check once more whether the present product is actually a Schaeffler original or a counterfeit. With our OriginCheckApp, the Schaeffler OneCode of a product can be easily scanned and authenticated. This way you are optimally protected against counterfeit products. ✅ More information: https://bit.ly/3RDdCRe   {hashtag|\#|TrademarkProtection} {hashtag|\#|ProductPiracy}

Ce mercredi 01 février nous avons remis officiellement notre première certification Electrical Motor Repair à la société SIE – Société Industrielle d’Electricité du Havre pour la mise en œuvre des roulements FAG dans les moteurs électriques.   Cette certification qui a eu lieu en présence de notre partenaire Lechevalier, reconnaît la compétence de SIE et la qualité de leur travail pour le montage, démontage et l’inspection des roulements.  S.I.E., spécialiste du moteur électrique industriel en France couvre les besoins de maintenance, révision, réparation, dépannage de moteurs, alternateurs, transformateurs, variateurs.   SIE peut être fier de ses collaborateurs et Schaeffler est très fier de pouvoir leur remettre ce certificat grandement mérité.   {hashtag|\#|Wepioneermotion} {hashtag|\#|CertifiedSchaefflerPartner} {hashtag|\#|Maintenance} {hashtag|\#|SIE} {hashtag|\#|Lechevalier}

Announcing the appointment of Ms. @[Sumithasri Eranti](urn:li:person:TEbP_joU4j) as the New Chairperson of Schaeffler India's Board of Directors.  With over 25 years of experience in business leadership, technology, consulting and financial services industry, Ms. Eranti brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to her new role. Vedeli ste, že spoločnosť Schaeffler má svoju logistickú “rubikovú” kocku❓  Nejde však o žiadnu kocku na hranie. Transportation Data Cube \(TDC\) je inteligentný databázový program, ktorý sme vyvinuli priamo v spoločnosti Schaeffler.   Keďže naša logistická sieť zahŕňa 121 krajín a na prepravu využívame všetky druhy dopravných prostriedkov, naším cieľom je neustále zlepšovať naše procesy. Úlohou TDC je teda urýchliť výber a plánovanie najefektívnejšej cesty za najnižšiu cenu.  Čo tento systém ešte dokáže? ➡️ Vypočíta CO2 stopu jednotlivých ciest a pomáha znižovať emisie. ➡️ Vytvorí digitálny obraz jednotlivých ciest. ➡️ Zrýchľuje procesy v spoločnosti a prispieva k ich transparentnosti.  Prečítajte si viac o našom prístupe k plánovaniu prepravy na 👉 https://bit.ly/3DPYvOv   #WeAreSchaeffler #Wepioneermotion

The #SchaefflerAward is given in honor of outstanding employee performances. 🙌🏆 “The commitment, enthusiasm and competence of our many employees are the guarantor of the success of the Schaeffler Group”, emphasises our CEO Klaus Rosenfeld. This year, the Schaeffler Award already celebrates its fifth anniversary!  As the highest award within the Schaeffler Group, the Schaeffler Award is explicitly aligned with our corporate values, as reflected in the categories: Sustainability, Excellence, Innovation and Passion. On the occasion of the fifth anniversary, this year there is also the category Special, which honors outstanding employee performances related to resilience.   As of today, projects referring to the calendar year 2022 can be submitted which must be associated with a sustained positive contribution to the ongoing success of the Schaeffler Group. We are looking forward to it – follow us to stay tuned and get the results.  #WeAreSchaeffler #Wepioneermotion

Schaeffler dáva medicínu do pohybu. 🚑  A tento pohyb pomáha spájať medicínu s ľuďmi. Mobilná zdravotná starostlivosť umožňuje liečiť pacientov, ktorí k nej nemajú bežne prístup alebo podcenili prevenciu a potrebujú rýchlu pomoc.   Zdravotná starostlivosť mimo nemocnice môže mať dve podoby, ktoré sa navzájom dopĺňajú. Môže byť vo forme kliniky na kolesách či vo vzduchu alebo v podobe aplikácie, ktorá pomôže s diagnostikou pacienta či riadením zdravotníckeho prístroja.  V obidvoch formách sú Schaeffler komponenty dôležitou súčasťou, pretože umožňujú presun prístrojov a tiež ich precízne fungovanie. ⚙️  Viac o budúcnosti zdravotnej starostlivosti a plánoch našej spoločnosti v tejto oblasti sa dočítate v našom anglickom magazíne 👉 https://bit.ly/41lWzYo   #Wepioneermotion

We've been moving the world for decades. Founded in 1946 in Herzogenaurach, the success story of our company started with the invention of the cage-guided needle bearing by Dr.-Ing. E.h. Georg Schaeffler. 💡⚙️ In 1950 we applied for a patent. Since then, our engineers have been working on further groundbreaking technologies every day. Current examples include e-mobility, robotics, hydrogen and digital solutions.  Therefore – not only on today's #WorldEngineersDay – we celebrate the creative, intelligent and amazing engineers who are constantly working hard to pioneer motion with us. For a better and more sustainable future. 💚  #WeAreSchaeffler #Wepioneermotion #EngineersDay2023

S kolegy ze slovenské pobočky naší společnosti @[Schaeffler](urn:li:organization:305287) jsme měli tu čest zúčastnit se 25. ročníku Dne firem na @[Brno University of Technology](urn:li:organization:15093419). 🧐  Na této akci jsme prezentovali naše aktivity a příležitosti pro studenty v našich závodech na v České republice a Slovensku. 💪. „Firemní den je především příležitostí pro studenty, aby se seznámili s potenciálními zaměstnavateli a získali přehled o tom, co mohou po studiu dělat. Proto jsme se jim snažili co nejvíce pomoci a odpovědět na všechny jejich otázky,“ říká Ján Klimko, vedoucí R&D Schaeffler Kysuce.  I my jsme z akce odjížděli obohaceni. 💡 Zjistili jsme, jak vidí svou budoucnost a kariéru budoucí kolegové z našeho oboru. Věříme, že i díky osobním setkáním se studenty se nám podaří přilákat do naší společnosti ty nejlepší talenty a do našich týmů přibydou mladí kolegové, kteří budou pro naše společnosti přínosem.   #WeAreSchaeffler

Zukunft trifft Zukunft: Studierende des weiterbildenden Studiums „Windenergietechnik und -management“ von ForWind zu Gast bei Schaeffler in Schweinfurt, wo wir innovative Lösungen für die Windenergie der Zukunft gestalten.   Als Marktführer und strategischer Entwicklungspartner bietet Schaeffler seit rund 40 Jahren zuverlässige Lagerlösungen für On- und Offshore-Windkraftanlagen, weltweit.   ForWind - das Zentrum für Windenergieforschung der Universitäten Oldenburg, Hannover und Bremen - richtet sich an Fach- und Führungskräfte, die ihre Zukunft in der Windenergiebranche auf ein solides Fundament aus Fachwissen und Schlüsselqualifikationen stellen wollen. Aufbau und Inhalte des berufsbegleitenden Studiums werden von ForWind in engem Kontakt mit Firmen der Windenergiebranche entwickelt.   #Wepioneermotion #Windenergie #WindPower #WindEnergy #ForWind

Don’t miss an excellent opportunity to better understand costly failures of rolling bearings – and get to know innovative solutions to avoid them. At the 2023 Conference for Wind Power Drives \(CWD\), Schaeffler engineering experts present their findings on how impact times of damaging triggers influence bearing failure risks.    For this, our team conducted a large number of bearing tests with damaging additional loads such as electric currents and studied cracks in the microstructure of the bearing steel – so-called white etching cracks \(WEC\).   For more insights, join our experts at the CWD in Aachen/Germany on 21/22 March.   #Wepioneermotion #WhiteEtchingCracks #bearings #maintenance #CWD2023 #DSEC2023 #WindPower #WindEnergy @[RWTH Aachen University](urn:li:organization:9790)

A Schaeffler conquistou o 1º lugar no Prêmio Aliança 2023, categoria Diamante, realizado pela distribuidora DPK da Companhia DPaschoal. A premiação aconteceu no dia 14 de março e ainda reconheceu a empresa nas categorias “Prêmio Destaque: categoria apoio em Marketing” e “Prêmio Excelência e Qualidade em Capacitação Automotiva: Instrutor destaque”, no qual o técnico Sergio Listoff foi homenageado pelos treinamentos realizados junto aos clientes da companhia. O Prêmio Aliança é um programa de reconhecimento de fornecedores, parceiros e clientes da distribuidora DPK, para incentivar as boas práticas dentro do mercado de reposição automotiva. Parabenizamos toda a equipe do Aftermarket Automotivo por mais essa conquista!

Doručovanie zásielok a jedla v mestách bude rýchlejšie a udržateľnejšie. 🚲🌱   Začali sme totiž so sériovou výrobou bezreťazového pohonného systému Free Drive pre elektrické nákladné bicykle.    Systém bol vyvinutý v spolupráci so spoločnosťou Heinzmann GmbH & Co. KG s cieľom rozšíriť možnosti udržateľnej dopravy v mestách. Tento druh bicyklov budú v budúcnosti využívať logistické spoločnosti a doručovacie služby.   Prvým zákazníkom, ktorý si objednal systém Free Drive, je spoločnosť CIP Group. Ich vozidlá mocci Smart Pedal nastavia tak nové štandardy pre komerčnú mobilitu v mestách - efektívnosť a udržateľnosť.    Na vývoji prototypu tohto bezreťazového pohonného systému sa podieľali aj naši kolegovia z výskumu a vývoja v Schaeffler Skalica. Navrhli celkový dizajn planétovej prevodovky pre inovatívny pedálový generátor aj pohon.   Riešili aj analýzy a výpočty planétového unášača, čapov, podložiek, drážkových spojov či ložísk. Generátor pri šliapaní vytvorí rovnomerný odpor a dodá elektrickú energiu do elektromotoru na zadnom kolese. Prebytočná energia sa ukladá do batérie a v prípade potreby sa využíva na pohon.    #Wepioneermotion #cargobikes #sustainability #newmobility

Water is the source of all life 💧 #WorldWaterDay In order to conserve this vital raw material as much as possible, we want to reduce our fresh water supply by 20 percent by 2030 compared to 2019. Various projects are planned for this purpose: In addition to reducing water intake, we want to use extracted water several times by means of suitable circulation systems and treatment plants such as water evaporators.   Just like in our factory in Elgoibar, Spain. At the end of 2022, we installed a new multi-stage wastewater treatment plant there. Currently, around 75 percent of these waters can be reused. When the optimization measures are completed, almost 100 percent are in the cycle. In 2022 we were able to reduce our freshwater supply by 50,000 cubic meters of water – the equivalent of 15 Olympic swimming pools!  Read more about reducing our consumption of fresh water in our new sustainability report: https://bit.ly/3JVMvyD  #GreenMakesTheDifference #Wepioneermotion #AcceleratingChange   United Nations Water

Per noi di @[Schaeffler](urn:li:organization:305287) in Italia la Sostenibilità è al centro di ogni nostra azione, grande o piccola. Per questo nella mattina di martedì 21 marzo il nostro Amministratore Delegato @[Peter Schardig](urn:li:person:xa_eLwZteV) e @[Michelangelo Sciannandrone](urn:li:person:R2OwZqOLpm) Responsabile EHS, hanno presenziato alla Festa dell’Albero tenutasi presso l’Istituto Comprensivo G. Ferrari di Momo, organizzata dalla Pro Loco di Momo con il patrocinio del Comune di Momo, alla presenza del Sindaco e delle autorità locali.   In ottica di supporto ad iniziative del territorio e di maggiore adesione a proposte volte alla promozione della Sostenibilità, abbiamo donato degli alberi per arricchire l’area verde della scuola per la cerimonia di piantumazione. È stata l’occasione per parlare anche ai più piccoli delle iniziative che un grande Gruppo come Schaeffler mette in campo per la protezione dell’ambiente.  La mattinata ha visto una forte partecipazione attiva e creativa da parte dei numerosi bambini e ragazzi presenti.    #WeAreSchaeffler #GreenMakesTheDifference #Sustainability

Čo majú spoločné Schaeffler Kysuce a Žilinská univerzita ❓  Naozaj veľa! 💪 Táto univerzita je alma mater viacerých našich kolegov a zároveň prostredie, kde spoločne vzdelávame mladé talenty a prepájame vedomosti s praxou a modernými technológiami.   A vďaka výnimočnej spolupráci to môžeme robiť inovatívnymi formami. 💡 Jednou z nich je napríklad program o najnovších trendoch v mechatronike „Fit4Mechatronics“. V rámci neho sme vyškolili tím certifikovaných lektorov z univerzity, ktorí dnes tieto poznatky odovzdávajú v cykle školení našim zamestnancom. Podporu dostávame aj pri odporúčaní študentov do programu Young RnD Engineer alebo na vysokoškolskú prax.   Tešíme sa, že sme tento týždeň mohli privítať vedenie univerzity s rektorom, prorektormi a dekanmi fakúlt práve u nás v Schaeffler Kysuce. 🎓 Spoločne sme si pozreli nové projekty vo výrobe, priebeh výstavby nového RnD centra a  množstvo ďalších častí a aktivít nášho závodu, ktoré dokazujú, že študentom vieme poskytnúť naozaj moderný priestor na rozvoj.   Spoločné rozhovory o nových formách spolupráce a výskumu nás utvrdili v tom, aké kľúčové je toto partnerstvo pre budúcnosť študentov a možnosť ukázať im, že aj na Slovensku majú dostatok možností na napredovanie.    #Wepioneermotion #WeAreSchaeffler

We are pleased to announce that Mr. Nguyen Xuan Thang, Country Manager of Schaeffler Vietnam, has been elected to the Board of Directors of European Chamber of Commerce in Vietnam \(@[EuroCham Vietnam](urn:li:organization:876890)\) for the term of 2023 – 2025. Na globálnej úrovni sme si v Schaeffler stanovili cieľ, že od roku 2040 budeme fungovať klimaticky neutrálne a znížime emisie CO2 vo vlastnej výrobe, ako aj v dodávateľskom reťazci. 🌎  Okrem toho plníme aj krátkodobé ciele. Jedným z nich je zníženie spotreby sladkej vody do roku 2030 o 20 % v porovnaní s rokom 2019.   Práve ten sme si včera pripomenuli v súvislosti so Svetovým dňom vody. Naši kolegovia sa zapojili do krátkeho vedomostného kvízu alebo sa navzájom inšpirovali tipmi, ako ovplyvniť spotrebu vody v bežnom živote.   V oboch závodoch Schaeffler Kysuce aj Schaeffler Skalica máme zavedených viacero opatrení, napr:  ✅ Používame výrobné pracie zariadenia vybavené odlučovačmi olejov, čím znižujeme množstvo spotrebovanej vody na výmenu pracích roztokov a odlúčený olej opäť využijeme.   💧 Na polievanie využívame studničnú vodu.   ✅  Vďaka unikátnej osmotickej stanici sme za 2 roky prevádzky ušetrili 20 742 000 litrov pitnej vody, čo predstavuje ročnú spotrebu 176 štvorčlenných slovenských domácností.   💧  Recyklujeme aj demineralizovanú vodu, ktorú používame pri výrobe na chladenie.   ✅ Priemyselné vody z výroby čistíme v špeciálnom odparovacom zariadení.   #GreenMakesTheDifference #Wepioneermotion
